meanings.definition: A person who stars in a movie or play alongside another actor.
meanings.sent1: In the film, the costars had great chemistry on screen.
meanings.sent2: The costars shared equal screen time in the play.
meanings.sent3: The costars joked about their characters during breaks.
meanings.sent4: The costars were like two peas in a pod, always together.
meanings.sent5: The costars' friendship off-screen enhanced their on-screen performance.

meanings.definition: To act as a costar in a movie or play.
meanings.sent1: She costars with a famous actor in the upcoming movie.
meanings.sent2: They costarred in a successful Broadway production last year.
meanings.sent3: He costars in the film, but his character always steals the show.
meanings.sent4: The actress costars with grace and talent in every role.
meanings.sent5: Costarring requires teamwork and collaboration with fellow actors.
